p: EOCL (100 and 200 mg/kg, i.p.) and diazepam (1 mg/kg, i.p.) completely blocked the PTZ-induced convulsions, prolonged the latency for convulsions and decreased mortality rate ( Table 3). However, at the lowest dose of 50 mg/kg, i.p., there was about 20% protections but there was statistically significant (P < 0.01) delay in death time of the mice compared to control ( Table 4).
